CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1940, pg. 21 reads: "To Distribute Sepia Films - Lee A. Matthews, Pittsburgh director of the New Artist Service, who has been appointed release executive for colored motion pictures in Pennsylvania, Ohio and West Virginia. The announcement was made Friday by Bert Goldberg, representative of the producing combination, which includes George Randol, Argus Pictures, Aetna Films, Goldberg and Port Films and Benny Ray.  The combination plans 25 feature sepia films this year. - Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Lee A. Matthews seated behind desk and signing documents
